Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
International Association of Machinists, Lodge 434 Records
International Association of Machinists. Lodge 434
WAG.226
0.25 Linear Feet (1 boxes)
undated
Scope and Contents
This collection consists of loose correspondence, circulars and receipts that were removed from minutes books from 1898, 1906, and 1907.
